topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bd7a686368722def541200#post_54bd7a686368722def541200
Okay here's how you eat a crawfish.
You take the body in both hands and then RIP IT IN HALF.
Then you take the head part and suck out the barins and juices.
Then you take the butt part rip out the tail meat and eat it.
